content: "Are you going to put this on Kongregate?" "Yes, there is a two-week period where the game will only be available on Armor Games since they're sponsoring it, but I will upload it to Kongregate after that."
translations: ita:Lo metterai su Kongregate﹖ Sì, c'è un periodo di due settimane in cui il gioco sarà disponibile soltanto su Armor Games,
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Ooneykcall (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
